text:
That’s actually a pre-screen before you get to the dashboard. It appears I think the second time you log into a HubSpot portal as well as when you click the HubSpot logo.

It’s user specific, and lets you pick the screen you prefer to have come up when you log in or click the sprocket.

For example if you work in the blog a ton, you can set the blog dashboard as where it sends you. If you want the first thing you see to be your reporting dashboards, you can do that.
